description:
At LGS, we strive to provide a workplace that values your professional growth. Our company culture fosters diversity and inclusivity, and we welcome talents from both local and international backgrounds. 

 As a team member, you will play a crucial role in driving major projects that propel our clients’ businesses forward and improve people’s lives. You will be at the heart of collaborative large-scale digital transformation projects in both the public and private sectors. 

 The IBM Client Innovation Centre Quebec (CIC), at LGS, employs professionals who collaborate on projects within technology practices, offering local and remote services. Our employees, regardless of their level of experience, are paired with a coach to support their professional growth. As part of IBM’s global network, we have offices in Montreal, Gatineau, Rimouski, and Quebec City. 

 
The benefits of joining our team:
 
 
 Learn every day: access IBM's intellectual capital and trainings on a diverse range of cutting-edge technologies. 
 For your well-being: a group insurance bundle including telemedicine, a retirement savings plan with employer’s contribution, access to IBM shares at discounted rates, and a wellness package! 
 To enjoy quality time: annual vacations, additional company days off and special life events leaves! 
 To have fun with your colleagues: an active community and a social committee with regular activities to keep us all connected! 
 Join our team as an Oracle Cloud Functional Analyst! 
Here is how you will be involved 

 
 Leading and participating in workshops to determine and analyze your clients' functional requirements 
 Advise your clients, taking into account best practices for the chosen solution 
 Establish parameterization requirements and configure the application 
 Provide support during the various phases of testing and post-implementation of the solution 
 Supervise more junior members of your team 
 Your experience 

 
 University degree or college diploma in an appropriate discipline and a minimum of 4 years experience in a similar position (Oracle Cloud modules HCM, Finance or SCM) 
 Good knowledge of Oracle Cloud finance, procurement, human resources or other modules and how they work 
 Exposure to projects involving the implementation of business software packages or Oracle management solutions. 
 You stand out for 

 
 Your outstanding ability to grasp business processes, to understand their current applications and to envisage their potential evolution based on the possibilities offered by the technological solution 
 Your talent for proposing and developing new ideas as well as conceptualizing innovative approaches and solutions 
 Your excellent interpersonal and results-oriented communication skills 
 Your interest in linking business and technology 
 Your French and English bilingualism will allow you to collaborate with resources outside the province of Quebec. 
 #CICJOBS #IBMJOBS 

 Be yourself at LGS 

 LGS is committed to considering all qualified applicants without regard to ethnicity, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodiversity, age, veteran status or other characteristics. 

 If you are not a Canadian permanent resident or citizen, please consult with your talent acquisition consultant as this role may require the use of technologies that are regulated by export sanctions.
